Class Traces

  • public final class Traces
extends java.lang.Object
    Traces management class.

    • Method Detail

      • getStream

        public static final OutputDevice.Interface getStream()
        Traces output stream accessor.
        Returns:
        Traces output device, or null-device if an error occured.

      • setStream

        public static final boolean setStream(OutputDevice.Interface CLI_Stream)
        Stream positionning (if not already set).
        Parameters:
        CLI_Stream - Stream reference.
        Returns:
        true: success, false: failure. When SetStream() has not been called previously, then it takes CLI_Stream in account immediately for tracing. Otherwise it stacks the stream (for consistency concerns) and waits for the previous ones to be released possibly.

      • unsetStream

        public static final boolean unsetStream(OutputDevice.Interface CLI_Stream)
        Restores the initial traces output stream.
        Parameters:
        CLI_Stream - Output device to be used.
        Returns:
        true: success, false: failure.

      • setFilter

        public static final void setFilter(TraceClass CLI_Class,
             boolean B_ShowTraces)
        Modifies the traces filter.
        Parameters:
        CLI_Class - Trace class object of the filter modification.
        B_ShowTraces - true if the traces should be displayed, false otherwise.

      • setAllFilter

        public static final void setAllFilter(boolean B_ShowTraces)
        Modifies the traces filter for all trace classes.
        Parameters:
        B_ShowTraces - true if the traces should be displayed, false otherwise.

      • trace

        public static final void trace(TraceClass CLI_TraceClass,
         java.lang.String STR_Text)
        Sends a trace to the trace system.
        Parameters:
        CLI_TraceClass - Corresponding trace class.
        STR_Text - Text of the trace.

      • safeTrace

        public static final boolean safeTrace(TraceClass CLI_TraceClass,
                NativeObject CLI_AvoidTraces,
                java.lang.String STR_Text)
        Safe trace routine.
        Parameters:
        CLI_TraceClass - Corresponding trace class.
        CLI_AvoidTraces - Avoid stream from being sent traces.
        STR_Text - Text of the trace.
        Returns:
        true if traces are safe, false otherwise. Prevents output from infinite loops.

      • safeTrace

        public static final boolean safeTrace(TraceClass CLI_TraceClass,
                int I_AvoidTracesDeviceRef,
                java.lang.String STR_Text)
        Safe trace routine.
        Parameters:
        CLI_TraceClass - Corresponding trace class.
        I_AvoidTracesDeviceRef - Reference of device to avoid from being sent traces.
        STR_Text - Text of the trace.
        Returns:
        true if traces are safe, false otherwise. Prevents output from infinite loops.
